description: Variation of condition 1 of listed building consent dated 30th July 2020 (RN 19/10014/LBC) for the excavation of a basement under the rear garden; erection of rear extension at ground and lower ground floor levels; installation of staircase in front basement lightwell; alterations and excavation of front basement vaults and internal alterations. NAMELY, repointing front and back elevations (except closet wing), rebuilding section of wall at rear, lowering both basement vaults, revised boiler flue position, change from zinc cladding to aluminum fascia and capping to rear glazed extension, extend the party wall on the side of no. 28, rebuild party garden wall on the side of no. 28, bring front lightwell/porch forward with new roof and rplace all internal doors to habitable rooms around staircase with fire doors to comply with building regulations.
